name: nabi1i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wnan(w0, w1)
-| wnan(w2, w1)
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnan(w0, w1)
-| wnan(w2, w1)
-| wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w2, w1), wnan(w0, w1))
-| wb(w2, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnan(w0, w1)
-| wnan(w2, w1)
-| wb(w2, w0)

|- wnan(w0, w1)
-| wnan(w2, w1)
-| wb(w0, w2)

comment: Constructor rule for ` -/\ ` . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 2-Sep-2011.)
